scripts.help: node -e "console.log('Namespaces: repo | fe | be | e2e | sec | qa | desk | docker | docs | all')"
scripts.repo:licenses: node -e "console.log('License summary:'); console.log('Production packages:'); require('fs').readFileSync('yarn.lock', 'utf8').match(/^[^\s]/gm).filter(p => !p.includes('@')).slice(0,10).forEach(p => console.log('  ', p.split('@')[0])); console.log('\nFor detailed license info, check package.json dependencies.');"
scripts.fe:quality: yarn fe:format:check && yarn fe:lint && yarn fe:typecheck
scripts.be:install: node scripts/multiplatform.cjs python -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt -r backend/requirements-dev.txt
scripts.be:lint: node scripts/multiplatform.cjs tool ruff check backend --output-format=github
scripts.be:lint:fix: node scripts/multiplatform.cjs tool ruff check backend --fix
scripts.be:test:contract: node scripts/multiplatform.cjs tool schemathesis run api-spec.yaml --checks all --base-url http://localhost:8000
scripts.be:quality: yarn be:format:check && yarn be:lint && yarn be:complexity
scripts.be:quality:monitored: node scripts/python-timeout-monitor.cjs test unit && yarn be:quality
scripts.sec:deps:be: node scripts/multiplatform.cjs tool pip-audit -r backend/requirements.txt -r backend/requirements-dev.txt
scripts.sec:all: yarn sec:sast && yarn sec:deps:fe && yarn sec:deps:be
scripts.qa:test: yarn fe:test && yarn be:test && yarn be:test:integration
scripts.qa:gate: yarn qa:docs:validate && yarn fe:quality && yarn be:quality && yarn fe:test && yarn be:test && yarn e2e:all && yarn sec:all
scripts.qa:gate:dev: yarn fe:quality && yarn be:quality && yarn fe:test && yarn be:test:quick
scripts.qa:gate:monitored: yarn fe:quality && yarn be:quality:monitored && yarn fe:test && yarn be:test:monitor
scripts.qa:gate:fast: yarn fe:lint && yarn fe:typecheck && yarn be:quality && yarn fe:test && yarn be:test
scripts.all:check: yarn qa:gate && yarn repo:licenses && yarn repo:integrity
scripts.install:frozen: echo "[DEPRECATED] Use: yarn repo:install" && yarn repo:install
scripts.setup: echo "[DEPRECATED] Use: yarn all:setup" && yarn all:setup

scripts.audit:critical: echo "[DEPRECATED] Use: yarn sec:deps:fe:strict" && yarn sec:deps:fe:strict
scripts.audit:moderate: echo "[DEPRECATED] Use: yarn sec:deps:fe" && yarn sec:deps:fe

deprecationPolicy.enforcement: CI will block PRs using deprecated commands after transition period
deprecationPolicy.migration: Use 'yarn help' to see namespace structure

securityCompliance.sastTools: Semgrep with auto-config and error exit codes
securityCompliance.dependencyAudit: Separate FE (npm audit) and BE (pip-audit) scanning
securityCompliance.mandatoryGates: sec:all required in qa:gate for comprehensive security validation
